items.summary: Update the panel catalog pricing so that the panels named "INTERNAL" and "AIMBOT VISIBLE" have the exact same prices as the "BASIC" panel for all durations that BASIC supports (1 DAY, 2 DAYS, 7 DAYS, 1 MONTH, PERMANENT).

Add a new panel entry to the panel catalog with name "SILENT AIM KRIPTON" and include it everywhere panels are rendered (Available Panels grid, search/filter, and the Pricing Table). Use the exact prices provided by the user for the durations they specified.

Resolve the conflicting/duplicate duration provided for "SILENT AIM KRIPTON" before shipping: the user specified two different prices for "7 DAY" (250 and 500). Implement the new panel with a single, unambiguous set of duration keys (matching the siteâ€™s duration labels, e.g., "7 DAYS"), and ensure no panel contains duplicate duration entries in its prices array.
